trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around April 24th 2010
divs: sighting detailsi was on the deck looking to the stars when i saw what i thought at first to be a balloon. i noticed it was dimly lit and was travelling in a straight line. it went out of my view for 1\2 second and then i noticed it seemed a lot higher up than i originally though and seemed to be travelling at a fast speed. i watched it until it was out of sight. i would say about 10-12 seconds altogether.
Summary: Round balloon like shape flying overhead
